projects.name: Tall Order
projects.desc: My first Godot game. Can you catch all the falling ingredients? Just be sure not to get anything rotten in the mix.;I was the sole developer of this project, handling the programming, art and sound effects.

projects.name: Grave Danger
projects.desc: A submission to the Pixel Game Jam (May 11 - May 20) that I developed in a team. Grow as many plants as you can in this garden that hides a deadly secret.

projects.name: Wave Mage
projects.desc: A submission to the 2025 Game Off (November 1 - December 1) that I developed as part of a team. As a medieval wizard, use and manipulate the power of sound waves to ward off vicious monsters.
